brief_summary: This study will evaluate the safety and efficacy of etanercept (Enbrel®) in children with Psoriasis. This is a Phase 3 blinded, placebo-controlled study.
description: 0.8 mg/kg (up to an intended dose of 50 mg) once weekly
0.8 mg/kg (up to an intended dose of 50 mg) once weekly
criteria: - Patients with plaque psoriasis - Patient may not receive certain psoriasis medications during the study
